@‡∂Ø‡∂ö‡∑î‡∂±‡∑ô ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∑É‡∑ô‡∂ö‡∑è‡∂ª‡∂∫‡∑è ranil kiyanne ponnayek yako,sirisena kiyanne halparuwek,fonseka kiyanne molek,jvp okkoma awastawadi.mahinda kiyanne hora takkadiyek dushita palakayek.

Man dannawa huttho mahinda monada kare monada nokare kiyala mahinda evilla yudde iwarakaranna nayakathwya nodunnanam tho thamath edan yata hangila eka dana ganna ponna pako ranilata kade yanna thopi wage samanala patau one tharam dakala thiyenawa man

@‡∂Ø‡∂ö‡∑î‡∂±‡∑ô ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∑É‡∑ô‡∂ö‡∑è‡∂ª‡∂∫‡∑è tho monada gon pako danne. tho dannawanam kiyapiya mahindaya lankawe idam kiyak vikkada pita ratata kiyala. tho wage mahindage ata lewa kana pakku hinda thamayi ratata kela vila thiyenne...
@‡∂Ø‡∂ö‡∑î‡∂±‡∑ô ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∑É‡∑ô‡∂ö‡∑è‡∂ª‡∂∫‡∑è Pala Pala do maharajata  ube Amma diyan ponnaya.kakul lewa kapan.mata hodai kiyanna aka deshapalakayek wath ne ado ..gono mun serama akai hutto
@Damaki Kw gon pako thota koheda jathakayak. tho muslim hambayek...
@Damaki Kw tho thambinta puka dena mahidage ranilageyi  awajathaka ballek.

@Damaki Kw tho ponnayekda pako. tho mahindageyi ranilageyi wahallu kiyala thoma pili gaththa neda. thopi wage ponnanayanta koheda lejjawak. thopi wage wahallunta ranilla mahindala hodayi kiyala higthena eka ahanna deyak nemeyi. thope ammala wage muslim ewunta kiyala hukagena thopi wage awajathakayo bihikarapu thope ammata hukapu muslim ballo thamayi weradi. tho muslim ponnayekne...
@Damaki Kw thoge wage gon weda man gawa ne.. thoge ammala akkala nangila innawanam mata dipanko man keri athulemayi yawanne gon pako
@Damaki Kw keriyo thoge genita man puke ariddi thoge ammawa mata dipan mage puka suppanna  thoge genita arinawa kimba palagena payiya eliyata ennama.
@Damaki Kw man purudu wune thoge ammata hukala. thoge pawulawath ewapan  mata ahuwunoth puketh arala yawanne....
@Damaki Kw tho ithin thoge ammage kimbath lewa kewa ekane. mage payiya dunne thoge ammage katata. thoge ammage kimbath ekayi katath ekayi gon pako

@Damaki Kw gon pako muslim ewunge payiya katata ganna vitharayi tho danne keriyo... mahindayata chande dunnath ranilata chande dunnath dekama ekayi gon pako.... thopi wage thambinge payiya wurana ponnayanta owa theren ne...

@Damaki Kw mahinda thamayi chande peretha kamata muslim ewunta vilpaththuwa dunne. kola nil hemadama muslim ewunta thamayi selakuwe. thope ammata muslim hambayoyi balloyi hukalayi tho ipadune. tho ekane muslim ewunta vil paththuwa dunna mahindage wahalek wela inne gon huththige putho. keri ponnayo tho meriyan gon pako. tho sinhala namakin inna keri thambi pakek. tho payiya kona kapagenada inne keri ponnayo...

@Damaki Kw thopi wage awajathaka keri ballo ipadila thiyenne thope ammage kimbata hema ekama hukala. thoge amma ballekta kiyala hukagena thamayi thowa hamba wela thiyenne. thopi wage mahindageyi ranilageyi passe yana kerima keri ballo nisa thamayi sinhalayata kela vila thiyenne...
@Damaki Kw keri ballo thope amma awajathakayek me loketa bihi karala thiyenne...
@Damaki Kw thoge ammata ballo hukala tho hambela thiyenne keriyo. tho ponnayekne ... nethuwa

@Damaki Kw thoge ammata mahindaya hukala wage... keri ponnayo thope apchchith thope ranilath dekama ekayi ponnayo. tho ipadila thoge ammata hukapu eka hukala iwara wela pihadala ithuru wunu keri walin ipadechcha ekek wuba. keri kapu rilawa wage balan inne nethuwa. thope ammata hukapu mahindayayi ranilayi mokadda wenasa kiyala. wun dennama hora kanawa...

@Damaki Kw nedakin keri ponnayo thopi merila yana dawasata thamayi ratata hari yanne. mata ranilath ekayi mahindayath ekayi. mahindage payiya suppana thoth ekayi keri ponnayo. thopi wage awajathaka heththa merila yana dawasata lankawata hari yayi.
@TikTok video paka thamayi mahindaya ranilayi dennama sri lankawa vikka. thopi wage gon buruwange chanden thamayi me horu bihi wenne.
@Thimira Alponsu thopi wage gon pakku merenakan lamkawata hariyan ne...thopi mahindage wahal pakku....
